=Templates=

Templates in VosaoCMS are used to arrange web design with page content.

For templates rendering Vosao uses Velocity engine.

Basic simple template looks like:
{{{
<html>
<head>
  <title>$page.title</title>
</head>  
<body>

$page.content

</body>

</html>
}}}

=== Template variables ===

*Current page*

 * page.title  
 * page.friendlyUrl
 * page.content

*Site global configuration*

 * config.googleAnalyticsId
 * config.siteEmail
 * config.siteDomain

*Helper service*

 * service.findPage(url) - find page by friendly url
 * service.findPageChildren(url) - find all child pages of specified page by url
